price: (19) Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
